name: Nordic Exhibition of Industry, Agriculture, and Art
engraver: George Ludwig Friedrich Schmahlfeld and Henrik Olrik
obverse: A woman stands in the center wearing a draped garment and a crown. She holds a wreath in both her hands. Flanking her are a set of two women on each side.
reverse: The great hall of the convention with a split-tail Danish flag on top.
description: This exhibition was held in Copenhagen in 1888. V. CHRISTESEN was a manufacturer of gold and silver wares.
